com.w2.api.engine.components.commands

Class LightRGB

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.w2.api.engine.components.commands.LightRGB
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RobotCommand, RobotComponent

    public class LightRGB
extends java.lang.Object
implements RobotCommand
    The LightRGB object instructs a Robot how to set the RGB values of its light. This command is applicable for light components capable of expressing the full RGB color range such as chest and ear lights.

    For each of the RGB values, the value is normalized between RobotComponentConstants.BRIGHTNESS_MIN and RobotComponentConstants.BRIGHTNESS_MAX
